Title: Love the country, grow cotton
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社), Beijing
Notes: Below cotton is harvested, in the middle it is delivered to a Cooperative (合作社), above is a peasant with cotton and a worker with cloth. The small text says "Sell cotton, store cotton, support industrial production; city and countryside exchange to consolidate the alliance between workers and peasants" (售棉,儲棉,支援工業生產;城鄉交流,鞏固工農聯盟).
